info.title: Razin - Car Management Dashboard API 1.6
info.description:
Welcome to the Binar Car Rental - Car Management Dashboard . This dashboard is designed to provide a comprehensive solution for managing car rentals efficiently. It offers a user-friendly interface for administrators to manage cars, users, and rental orders seamlessly.

Some useful links:
- [GitHub Repository](https://github.com/RazinSyakib43/Car-Management-Dashboard/tree/Challenge_6)
- [ERD](https://dbdiagram.io/d/Razin-Car-Management-Dashboard-API-666aa385a179551be6c66564)

tags.name: Auth (Login)
tags.description: Endpoints related to User Authentication (Login) for member, admin, and superadmin

tags.name: Auth (Register)
tags.description: Endpoints related to User Authentication (Register) to register a new member and admin

tags.name: Users (Me)
tags.description: Endpoints related to the currently logged-in user, based on their token

post.description: This is the login endpoint for superadmin to access the superadmin dashboard

message.example: Successfully login as superadmin! Welcome, Ayanokoji Kiyotaka!
Password is incorrect
You are not a superadmin
Your email not found or has been deleted, please make a superadmin account first

example.message: Your email not found or has been deleted, please register as superadmin first

post.description: This is the login endpoint for admin to access the admin dashboard

message.example: Successfully login as admin! Welcome, Naruto!
Password is incorrect
You are not an admin
Your email not found or has been deleted, please register as admin first

example.message: Your email not found or has been deleted, please register as admin first

post.description: This is the login endpoint for member to get access to the dashboard

message.example: Successfully login as member! Welcome, Razin!
Password is incorrect
You are not a member

post.description: This endpoint is used to register a new admin. Only superadmins are authorized to access this endpoint.

message.example: User (Admin) created successfully
This email is already taken
Please login first or register if you don't have an account
You are not a superadmin

post.description: This endpoint is used to register a new member.

message.example: User (Member) created successfully
This email is already taken

get.description: Retrieves a list of all available cars in the system.

parameters.name: includeDeleted
parameters.description: Include deleted cars in the response (true or false). If not provided, the default value is false and only active cars will be shown.

post.summary: Adds a new car to the system.

message.example: Car added successfully

value.message: Please fill all required fields (name, category, price, image)

message.example: Please login first or register if you don't have an account
You're not allowed to access this endpoint

get.summary: Searches for cars based on car name.

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: The name of the car to search for.

200.description: A list of cars matching the search query.

message.example: Car that you are looking for is not found

example.message: Car that you are looking for is not found

get.summary: Retrieves detailed information about a specific car by its ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the car to retrieve.

200.description: Detailed information about the specified car.

message.example: Car not found

put.summary: Updates the details of a specific car by its ID.

message.example: Car with id 9 updated successfully
Please login first or register if you don't have an account
You're not allowed to access this endpoint
Car not found

delete.summary: Deletes a specific car from the system by its ID.

message.example: Car with id 10 deleted successfully
Please login first or register if you don't have an account
You're not allowed to access this endpoint

example.message: You're not allowed to access this endpoint

message.example: Car not found

get.description: Retrieves a list of all users registered in the system.

parameters.name: includeDeleted
parameters.description: Include deleted cars in the response (true or false). If not provided, the default value is false and only active cars will be shown.

message.example: Please login first or register if you don't have an account
You're not allowed to access this endpoint

post.description: Registers a new user in the system.

message.example: User (superadmin) created successfully
This email is already taken
Please login first or register if you don't have an account
You're not allowed to access this endpoint

get.description: Retrieves detailed information about a specific user by their ID.

message.example: Please login first or register if you don't have an account

404.description: User not found or has been deleted.

message.example: Your profile updated successfully

get.description: Retrieve a list of all orders, including details such as user information, car details, rental periods, pricing, and status.

message.example: orders not found
Please login first or register if you don't have an account
You're not allowed to access this endpoint

post.description: Creates a new order in the system.

id_car.description: The ID of the car to be rented

id_user.description: The ID of the user renting the car

start_rent.description: The start date and time of the rental

rent_duration.description: The duration of the rental in days

message.example: Order created successfully
Please login first or register if you don't have an account

get.description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific order by its ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the order to retrieve

message.example: Order not found
Please login first or register if you don't have an account
You're not allowed to access this endpoint

put.description: Updates the details of an existing order based on the provided ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the order to update

id_car.description: The ID of the car to be rented

id_user.description: The ID of the user renting the car

start_rent.description: The start date and time of the rental

rent_duration.description: The duration of the rental in days

message.example: Order updated successfully
Please fill one of the required fields (car, user, start_rent, rent_duration, status)
Please login first or register if you don't have an account
You're not allowed to access this endpoint

delete.description: Deletes an existing order based on the provided ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the order to delete

message.example: Order with id 5 deleted successfully
Please login first or register if you don't have an account
You're not allowed to access this endpoint
Order not found
